testcase.classname: Create a new user if username and password not prsent in config file.
testcase.name: login with exising user and added product to cart
testcase.system-out: Given user Nagivate to Sign page............................................passed When Enter username and password............................................passed And click login button......................................................passed And select product based on user requirement "FISH".........................passed And Select Product based on user required product Types "FISH" and "Koi"...passed And Select Product sub category based on requirement "FISH" "Koi" and "Spotted Koi".passed And Add the item to cart....................................................passed And click on Proceed to checkout btn........................................passed Then Payment page Displayed.................................................passed When Click on contiune btn..................................................passed And Click on confirm........................................................passed Then they can see order submitted msg.......................................passed When Click on Signout btn...................................................passed Then user landed on product page............................................passed
